description:
With a casual style that works at the office, the crag, and the beer garden, the Weisse is ready for summer.

  • Breathable, durable and comfortable hemp and organic cotton blend
  • Single chest pocket is ready for your sunnies and some cash
  • Dropped hem offers a bit more coverage and can even handle a tuck
  • UPF 30 blocks more than 95% of harsh UV
  • Regular fit feels right from day 1
name: Outdoor Research Weisse Shirt - Men's
